title: Adidas 3D Printed Eyewear Spits Out Lightest Frame with Maximum Ventilation
content:
These days, it seems like you can 3D print just about anything. Helmets, tools, pedals, saddles, bikes, even shoes are now being created out of thin air with the push of a button (and some seriously high tech printers). Now, thanks to Adidas, you can add sunglasses to that list. Adidas 3D CMPT: 20-Gram 3D Printed […]

The post Adidas 3D Printed Eyewear Spits Out Lightest Frame with Maximum Ventilation appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristen Arendt
